Name: Account Balance
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The total amount that is outstanding on the account, debit or credit.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Closed Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The date when the account was closed.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Currency
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Identifies the currency of the account.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A free-form text name of the account.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Number
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A unique business identifier for the account.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Opened Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The date when the account was opened.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The status of the account, for example: active, pending active, pending transfer, final, written off.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Account Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The categorization of the account into distinct types.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Address Line 1 Description
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: First line of the address, which includes street and building number.

Name: Adult Household Members
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of household members that are aged 18 years or older.

Name: Age Group
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The length of time that a person/individual has lived.

Name: Anti-money Laundering Monitoring Indicator
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Indicator if the customer account is monitored for transactions being suspicious of criminal activities involving the movement of money through accounts, banks and countries carried out using the financial institution.

Name: Arrears Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The total amount of money which is owed to an organization on payments due on the account, but not received as of the payment due date.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Credit Card Account

Name: Authorization Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Identifies a date upon which an action has been authorized. For example, the date upon which a code is issued by a bank to authorize a Credit Card Payment.

Name: Communication
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The receiving or sending of an information between two parties. A communication may be in any medium such as a telephone call, a letter, an email, a meeting, and so on.

Name: Communication End
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The date and time when the communication was ended.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication

Name: Communication Start
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The date and time when the communication was initiated.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication

Name: Communication Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The communication status distinguishes between communications according to their current state, for example: awaiting further information, closed, open.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication

Name: Communication Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Indicates the type of communication that has occurred or is planned to occur, for example: campaign mailing, complaint, quotation request.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication

Name: Credit Card Account
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The credit card account includes information from the customer credit card agreements.

Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Account Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The postal address associated with the customer account.

Name: Customer Account Investment Objective
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Primary goal that the product linked with this account is intended to satisfy. It can change over time, for example, funds for retirement may at first have a goal of capital appreciation, but as retirement approaches it may change to safety or liquidity.

Name: Customer Account Life Cycle Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Additional classification of customer account status that determines the status of the account based on its life cycle.

Name: Customer Account Product Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Classification of product or service that this account represents or is associated with this account.

Name: Customer Account Risk Tolerance
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Classifies the customer's tolerance to market risk in context of customer account. It determines the type of trading and investment. When trading or investing in financial markets, high risk strategies can provide the greatest return.

Name: Customer Acquisition Cost
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The primary costs of establishing the customer. The money spent on convincing the customer to purchase the products or services of the organization.

Name: Customer Active Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Identifies the number of active customer accounts.

Name: Customer Agreement
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: An agreement between the customer and the organization to pay for goods or services. The agreement records billing information about the type of service and product that is provided.
Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Loan Account

Name: Customer Agreement Number
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The unique alphanumeric value that is assigned in the business process and identifies the customer agreement.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: An organization specific classification of the customer agreement.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Validity End
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The date and time when the validity of the customer agreement ceased.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Validity Start
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The date and time when the validity of the customer agreement commenced.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer All Accounts Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of all fees on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Behavior
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The manner in which a customer prefers to purchase products; buyer behavior or past history.

Name: Customer Buy Trades
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of buy trade transactions carried out by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Buy Trades Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of all buy trades executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Call Duration
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The net duration of the customer call measured from the time when the call is answered to the time the call ended usually expressed as number of minutes.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Phone Call

Name: Customer Calls
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all phone calls with customers, both customer and organization initiated, in the assessed period.

Name: Customer Commision Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of commission amounts from all trades executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Communication
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The communication between the customer and the organization typically handled by a contact center.

Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication

Name: Customer Complaints
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all customer complaints recorded in assessed period.

Name: Customer Credit Authority Level
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Scale of authority for credit of the customer on the market, for example: high, medium, low.

Name: Customer Credit Score
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A score that evaluates the ability of a customer to pay their debts. Rating scores are viewed in terms of the specific type of assessment or set of values used to evaluate a particular aspect of a financial services marketplace.

Name: Customer Deposits
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all deposit transactions executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Deposits Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts from all deposit transactions on the customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Emails
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all customer emails received in assessed period.

Name: Customer Fees
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of fee transactions appearing on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Financial Assets
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Total value of all financial assets in possession of the customer.

Name: Customer Financial Assets Under Management
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Total value of assets held by the financial institution on behalf of a customer.

Name: Customer Identifier
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A unique number that identifies the customer.

Name: Customer Importance
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The level of importance that the customer has to the organization, for example: low, normal, high, VIP.

Name: Customer Influencer Score
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A score that expresses the influence that the customer has on others. The score suggests how strongly the communication and behavior of the customer influences the behavior of other people.

Name: Customer Interest Earned Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The amount of all interests earned on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Interest Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of interest related fees on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Language
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Identifies the natural language associated with customer for use in communications.

Name: Customer Liabilities
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The amount of all customer's debts.

Name: Customer Management Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of management related fees on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Market Change Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts from all transactions related to market change on the customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Net Present Value
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The present value of the customer's net expected future cash flows minus the cost of investment (or cost of acquisition).

Name: Customer Non-Financial Assets
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Total value of all non-financial assets in possession of the customer.

Name: Customer Phone Call
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A call between a customer and a contact center agent. This includes both contact center inbound and outbound phone calls.
Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Communication

Name: Customer Products
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of products the customer owns or has a subscription for.

Name: Customer Response to Latest Offer
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Identifies whether there was a response from the customer towards the latest offer made.

Name: Customer Satisfaction
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The overall satisfaction of the customer with the goods or services that are provided by the organization.

Name: Customer Sell Trades
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of sell trade transactions carried out by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Sell Trades Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of all sell trades executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Sentiment
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The overall attitude of the customer to the goods or services provided by the organization.

Name: Customer Social Media Posts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all customer posts in social media addressed to the organization in the assessed period.

Name: Customer Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The status of the customer based on whether there is an active agreement in place between the customer and the organization, for example: active, dormant, former, prospect.

Name: Customer Transaction Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of transaction related fees on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The type of the customer based on the classification of the organization that is in a contractual or other relationship with the customer, for example: residential, industrial, commercial, government.

Name: Customer Units Bought
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all units bought in trade transactions executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Units Sold
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all units sold in trade transactions executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Waived Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts of waived fees on customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Customer Willingness To Recommend
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The customer's satisfaction with a product that quantifies the probability that the customer would recommend this product.

Name: Customer Withdrawals
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of all withdrawal transactions executed by customers in assessed period.

Name: Customer Withdrawals Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The sum of amounts from all withdrawal transactions on the customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Growth As Investment Objective Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of customer accounts that have 'growth' set as their investment objective.

Name: High Risk Tolerance Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of customer accounts with high tolerance to market risk.

Name: Inbound Calls
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of calls to contact center initiated by the customer during the analyzed period. This includes both answered and abandoned calls.

Name: Inbound Communications
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of contacts with the organization that were initiated by the customers during the analyzed period. This includes phone calls, emails, text messages or communications using social media.

Name: Income As Investment Objective Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of customer accounts that have 'income' set as their investment objective.

Name: Last Customer Response Time
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Amount of time taken since the most recent customer response.

Name: Last Product Offer Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Date of the latest product offer made to a customer.

Name: Loan Account
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Identifies a finance service agreement in which the financial institution puts its assets at risk for the benefit of customers.

Name: Low Risk Tolerance Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of customer accounts with low tolerance to market risk.

Name: Moderate Risk Tolerance Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of customer accounts with moderate tolerance to market risk.

Name: New Customer Agreements
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of new customer agreements that were created in a given period of time.

Name: Number of Customer Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of customer accounts in assessed period.

Name: Number of Customer Communications
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of all communications with customers, both customer and organization initiated, in the assessed period. This includes phone calls, letters, emails, texts, social media interactions, web and mobile chats.

Name: Outbound Calls
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of contact center calls to customer during the analyzed period. This includes both calls answered by customer and calls ended by agent due to customer not answering.

Name: Outbound Communications
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The number of customer contacts with the organization that were initiated by the contact center during the analyzed period. This includes phone calls, email, text messages or communications using social media.

Name: Planning As Investment Objective Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Number of customer accounts that have 'planning' set as their investment objective.

Name: Product
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Product identifies goods and services that can be offered, sold, or purchased by the customers.

Name: Product Description
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Provides a textual explanation or free form comments about the product.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Product

Name: Product Identifier
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: A unique number that identifies a product.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Product

Name: Product Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: The primary name assigned to the product that is used in reports and documents referring to the product.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Product

Name: Product Offer
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Details of the offer of the product to a particular customer based on the industry.
Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication

Name: Product Owned Indicator
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity
Description: Indicator of whether a particular product that was offered to a customer is now owned by the customer or not.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Communication
Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Product Offer

Name: Authorization Code
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies a code which has been received to authorize a requested action. For example, a code issued by a bank to authorize a Credit Card Payment.

Name: Card At Transaction Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates whether the credit card was physically present at the time of the transaction.

Name: Children Household Members
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The number of household members who are under the age of 18 years.

Name: City
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A geographic area that defines the boundaries of a community where people live. It is generally an incorporated or chartered area of a state or province.

Name: City Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the label assigned to or by which a city may be identified, for example: Chicago, Dublin, Sydney.

Name: Communication Content
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The text holding the content of the written communication (letter, web chat, email, text) or transcription of a phone call.

Name: Communication Delivery Format
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The format that is used for the delivery of a communication, for example: face-to-face, phone, social media, online chat.

Name: Communication Direction
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates whether the organization is receiving the communication (inbound) or sending the communication (outbound).

Name: Communication On Hold Time
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The amount of time spent in a suspended or on-hold mode during a communication.

Name: Communication Processing Time
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The amount of time spent in processing the communication.

Name: Communication Resolution Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The overarching method by which a communication is resolved or ended, for example: completed by agent, completed by self-service, disconnect, abandon.

Name: Communication Subject
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A text reference that aids the identification and understanding of this communication content.

Name: Country
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A geographic area that defines the boundaries of a nation.

Name: Country Code
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A code which identifies a country, for example: the country code for Ireland is 'IE'.

Name: Country Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the label assigned to or by which a country may be identified, for example: Ireland, India.

Name: Customer
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A person or organization buying goods or services from the organization.

Name: Customer Account
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Customer account includes information from the customer agreements to create billings or invoices for a customer and receive payment.

Name: Customer Account Collection Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A high-level status that describes where a customer is in the collections business cycle, for example: active, inactive.

Name: Customer Account Overdue Balance
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The total unpaid billed amount on the customer account that is older than predefined period.

Name: Customer Account Revenue Class
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The classification of the customers revenue for accounting, for example: residential, commercial, industrial.

Name: Customer Active Tenure
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The period of time during which the customer has an active agreement with the organization.

Name: Customer Advisor
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The person that provides financial advisory services to the customer.

Name: Customer Advisor Organization
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The organization that provides financial advisory services to the customer.

Name: Customer Agreement Channel
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The channel through which the agreement has been made, for example: phone, web, email, letter.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Payment Cycle
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The payment frequency that the customer is contractually expected to observe, for example: ad-hoc, on specified date, weekly, monthly.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Payment Method
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The type of payment that is received from the customer, for example: check, card, cash, electronic funds transfer, direct debit.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Sign Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The date when the customer agreement was consummated among associated persons, organizations or both.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Agreement Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The status of the agreement, for example: not eligible, pending, approved.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Agreement

Name: Customer Annual Income
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The amount of money an individual earns in a single year. Usually includes person's salary and bonuses as well as any other non-employment related income such as dividends from holdings in stocks and shares, trusts.

Name: Customer Household
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The household of the customer if the customer is a person.

Name: Customer Influenced Probability
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The probability that the customer can be influenced by the opinions of others.

Name: Customer Level Of Authority
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: An indicator of the customer's level of authority in their peer group, which provides insight into the impacts of the customer's behavior on the behavior of other people.

Name: Customer Lifetime Value
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The total projected earnings of a customer to the organization over its probable lifetime.

Name: Customer Loyalty Score
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies rating of the tendency of the customer to remain loyal to a company, indicating the likelihood that the customer may purchase from another company.

Name: Customer Market Segment
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The customer classification that is used to segment customers to produce and track the sales forecast.

Name: Customer Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The name by which a customer is known and which is usually used to identify that customer. For example: International Business Machines Corporation (IBM), Joe Bloggs.

Name: Customer Net Gain
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The net gain in customers of the organization expressed as: the number of customers gained minus the number of customers lost, in a given period.

Name: Customer Pursuit
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Classification of customer based on primary living habits and interests of the person.

Name: Customer Retirement Age
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The age at which the person is retiring and ceases to work in permanent employment.

Name: Customer Risk Category
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The classification of the risk that a customer will stop paying for goods or services, for example: critical, high, medium, low. As a result, if the customer debts are uncollectible, the organization might need to write off the customer account balance.

Name: Customer Social Network Influence Score
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The score that expresses the influence that the customer has on others. The score suggests how strong the communication and behavior of the customer influences the behavior of other people.

Name: Date Of Birth
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The date when an individual was born.

Name: Death Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The date when an individual died.

Name: Debt Service Coverage Ratio
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The debt service coverage ratio (DSCR), is the ratio of cash available for debt servicing to interest, principal and lease payments.

Name: Dormant Customer Rate
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The dormant customers expressed as a percentage of the active customers at the end of the analyzed period.

Name: Dormant Customers
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The number of customers without account transaction and communication during a given period of time. The dormant customers are the customers without any active contracts.

Name: Education Level
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The highest level of education of the person.

Name: Email Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: An electronic address that can be used to send and receive correspondence over a computer network, for example: jsmith@jonesinc.com.

Name: Employment Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The employment status of an individual, for example: full-time, part-time, unemployed, retired.

Name: Ethnicity
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A classification of an individual based on their membership in a group that is united and defined to a greater or lesser degree by common history, beliefs, culture, nationality, etc.

Name: Event Customer
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The customer to which the event is related to.

Name: Family Household Indicator
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates whether the household includes a couple, as well as at least one child of the couple.

Name: First Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A personal name typically used to refer to an individual in informal circumstances, for example: John, Mary.

Name: Fraud Reporting Source
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the party of the transaction that raised a suspicion of fraud.

Name: Gender
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates an individual's gender, for example: male, female.

Name: Head Of Household Indicator
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates whether the customer has certain legal and financial obligations to other members of the household.

Name: Home Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The address of a person's home.

Name: Household
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A group of individuals, who can be resident at the same address and members of the same family, that share a common economic interest and are treated as a unit for certain purposes.

Name: Household Disposable Income
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The amount of money that a household can spend after having paid all fixed expenses such as rent, mortgage repayments and so on.

Name: Household Gross Income
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The annual total of all income sources for the household, derived from the gross income of the household members.

Name: Household Home Ownership
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates whether a member of the household is also the property owner.

Name: Household Identifier
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A unique number that identifies the household.

Name: Household Income Source
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The source of income that contributes to most of the income for the household, which is relevant for accounts where ability-to-pay information was collected.

Name: Household Internet Use
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates whether the Internet is used in the household.

Name: Household Members
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The number of people, both adults and children, who are part of the household.

Name: Household Number Of Cars
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The number of cars that are used by the household.

Name: Household Poverty Level
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The percentage of poverty that is based on the annual income and number of members of a household, which is calculated for accounts for which ability-to-pay information was collected.

Name: Household Purchasing Power
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A rating of the relative spending power of the household, for example: affluent, low income, upper middle income.

Name: Household Size
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The number of people who are members of the household.

Name: Household Tenancy Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The tenancy status of the household main residence, for example: own, rent.

Name: Internet Banking Use Indicator
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicate whether the customer is using the internet banking services provided by a financial institution.

Name: Last Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies an individual's name which belongs to the family the individual is a part of, for example: Smith, Mueller.

Name: Mailing Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The postal address selected by customer for receiving of mail communication.

Name: Marital Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Current legal situation of the individual regarding marriage.

Name: Monthly Housing Cost
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The cost of the residential accommodation that may be based on rental or mortgage payments.

Name: Net Change In Customer Agreements
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The net number of agreements at the end of the given period of time expressed as: the number of agreements created minus the number of agreements closed during that period of time.

Name: Occupation
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Name of the person's work or business engagement, for example: farmer, professional, tradesperson, author, business owner, consultant, doctor, economist, homemaker.

Name: Oldest Household Adult Birth Year
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The year on which the oldest adult member of household was born.

Name: Oldest Household Child Birth Year
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The year on which the oldest child member of household was born.

Name: Postal Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The address to which mail is delivered.

Name: Postal Address Area Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Classifies the area to which the postal address belongs according to the density, type and layout of buildings.

Name: Postal Address City
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the city component of postal address.

Name: Postal Address Country
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the country component of postal address.

Name: Postal Address State
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the state component of postal address.

Name: Postal Code
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A code that is included in a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

Name: Preferred Contact Method
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Preferred contact method for communication, for example: mail, email, call, text.

Name: Primary Account Holder
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The primary account holder associated with the customer account.

Name: Primary Branch Proximity
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The distance of the primary branch location from the customer home address.

Name: Seniors Household Members
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The number of household members who are categorized as seniors.

Name: Social Media Account
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A profile that pertains to the social media presence of a person or organization. A person or organization each can have more than one social media account.

Name: Social Media Account Platform
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The social network platform on which the account exists.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360 >> Social Media Account

Name: Social Security Number
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: An identification number issued to citizens and permanent residents by a governmental agency for the purposes of qualifying for Social Security benefits.

Name: State
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A geographic area that is a political subdivision of a country. This can be a state or Province.

Name: State Code
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: A code which identifies a state or province, for example: the state code for Florida is 'FL'.

Name: State Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the label assigned to or by which a state may be identified, for example: Florida, Texas, Kentucky.

Name: Street
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The name of the street of the address.

Name: Suspicious Activity Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies an activity or series of activities which has alerted the organization to the possibility of an occurrence of illegal or suspicious activity.

Name: Telephone Number
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The general-purpose telephone information that is needed to contact a wired or wireless telephone device.

Name: Transaction Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The total gross value of the transaction.

Name: Transaction Medium
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the transactions according to conduit used, for example; face-to-face,email or online, phone.

Name: Transaction Reason Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Identifies the reason for the transaction. For example, a bill payment, salary lodgment.

Name: Transaction Status
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The current state of the transaction. For example, settled, pending, rejected, completed, canceled.

Name: Transaction
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: An exchange or transfer of funds, assets, or financial instruments between parties. Financial transactions occur in various settings, including personal finance, business finance, and investment activities. Here are some common types of financial transactions:

Name: Transaction Time
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The time on which the transaction actually occurred.

Name: Transaction Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: Indicates the type of transaction. For example, payment, charge off etc.

Name: Customer Account Buy Trades
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of buy trade transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Buy Trades Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts of all buy trades on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Commision Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of commission amounts from all trades on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Deposits
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of all deposit transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Deposits Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts from all deposit transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Fees
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of fee transactions appearing on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts of all fees on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Fees In Arrears Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amount of all fees on the customer account which is owed to the financial institution on payments due on the account, but not received as of the payment due date.

Name: Customer Account Interest Earned Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The amount of all interests earned on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Interest Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts of interest related fees on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Market Change Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts from all transactions related to market change on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Sell Trades
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of sell trade transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Sell Trades Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts of all sell trades on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Transaction Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts of transaction related fees on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Units Bought
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of all units bought in trade transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Units Sold
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of all units sold in trade transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Waived Fees Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts of waived fees on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Withdrawals
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of all withdrawal transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Account Withdrawals Amount
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of amounts from all withdrawal transactions on the customer account in assessed period.

Name: Customer Attrition Rate
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The ratio of the customers lost in a given period to the number of customers that were active at the start of that period.

Name: Customer Tenure
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The duration in years or months since the start date of the first agreement the customer had with the organization.

Name: Properties Owned
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The number of properties owned by the customer.

Name: Returned Customers
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The number of ex-customers that became active again by signing a new customer agreement in a given period of time.

Name: Secure Growth As Investment Objective Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of customer accounts that have 'secure growth' set as their investment objective.

Name: Security As Investment Objective Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of customer accounts that have 'security' set as their investment objective.

Name: Tax Advantage Indicator
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Indicates whether the account provides a tax benefit to customer, or not.

Name: Top Spending Category
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The personal expenses category with highest customer spending, for example: food, health, housing, insurance, personal, recreation, savings, transportation, utilities.

Name: Trading Volume
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The sum of all amounts of trades carried out by customer in assessed period.

Name: Transaction Count
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: The number of transactions performed by, or on behalf of, the organization.

Name: Very Low Risk Tolerance Accounts
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Attrition Prediction
Description: Number of customer accounts with very low tolerance to market risk.

Name: Account Status Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Identifies a date that represents a calendar date associated with a change in account status; for example, date the account achieved a status of In Default.

Name: Bereavements
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted bereavements affecting customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Census
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Information related to demographic data over a period of time.

Name: Census Age Range
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Age range of customer based on census data.

Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Census

Name: Census Birth Probability
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Probability of a birth based on census data analysis.

Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Census

Name: Census Divorce Probability
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Probability of a divorce based on census data analysis.

Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Census

Name: Census Marriage Probability
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Probability of a marriage based on census data analysis.

Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Census

Name: Census Migration Probability
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Probability of a customer migrating based on census data analysis.

Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Census

Name: College Graduations
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted college graduations in households of customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: County
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The name of the county.

Name: Customer Event
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Customer related events recorded by the organization, that include, life related events, account status updates and account or agreement related changes excluding events like account transactions or records of communication.

Name: Customer Event Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The date on which the event occurred. Can include time at which the event occurred for certain types of events.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Customer Event

Name: Customer Event Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Classification of the of the customer event, for example: home purchase, divorce, pregnancy, close savings account.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Customer Event

Name: Customer Satisfaction With Communication Rating
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The customer satisfaction rating score specified by the customer about the communication contact.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Offer Affinity >> Customer Communication

Name: Driver License Number
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The unique number assigned to an individual's driver license.

Data Classes: Newfoundland and Labrador Province Driver's License
Prince Edward Island Province Driver's License

Name: Engagements
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted engagements in life of customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Event Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Describes various related event types such as transfer of funds, account transaction, agreement changes, customer interactions, social media posts, medical procedures and customer important dates such as birthday.
Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Customer Event Type

Name: Event Type Category
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Classification of the event type into various group, for example: life, medical event or procedure, transfer, transaction, account change, agreement change, transaction, interaction, communication, birthday, anniversary.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Event Type

Name: Event Type Code
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The abbreviation of the event type name or randomly generated short text used as unique identifier of the event type.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Event Type

Name: Event Type Name
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The name of the event type that can also be used as an identifier, for example: birth of child, marriage, job change, funds transfer out, open savings account, large withdrawal, inbound call, email received, medical procedure, payroll change.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Event Type

Name: Home purchases
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted home purchase done by customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Job Changes
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted job changes experienced by customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Job Losses
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted job losses experienced by customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Marriages
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted customer marriages in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: New Children
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted new children in the families of customers in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Proves Event Type
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Another type of event that this event type proves, for example closing of securities account proves the attrition.
Related Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Event Type
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Event Type

Name: Relocations
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The number of actual or predicted customer relocations in the assessed period of time for all or selected group of customers.

Name: Transaction
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Identifies an activity that represents the recording of events on customer account.

Name: Transaction Currency
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Identifies a currency recorded on the transaction.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Transaction

Name: Transaction Date
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The date on which the transaction actually occurred.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Transaction

Name: Transaction Device Identifier
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The identifier of the device used to initiate the transaction. For example, the ATM identifier, the Teller Position Identifier etc.
Part Of Terms: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction >> Transaction

Name: Wallet Share
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Indicates available wealth of customer compared to his utilization of products and services of the organization.

Name: Work Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: The address of a person's work.

Name: Years At Current Address
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Indicates the length of residence at current address.

Name: Years With Current Employer
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer Behavior >> Customer Life Event Prediction
Description: Indicates the number of years of employment with current employer.

Name: Youngest Household Adult Birth Year
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The year on which the youngest child member of household was born.

Name: Youngest Household Child Birth Year
Category: Customer Vocabulary >> Customer 360
Description: The year on which the youngest adult member of household was born.
